name: Golden Trap
description:
Dive into dangerous ruins of Indian golden culture! How much gold can you take with you and survive?

Made during the BenBonk Game jam

NoNinja - Game Art & Design

caphos1 - Programming & UI

- Controls -

AD / Arrow Keys - MOVE

LEFT CTRL - ROLL

SPACEBAR - JUMP

T - DROP BOMB

E - INTERACT

W - EXIT DOOR
